#summary Get Involved in Gaixie Micrite.
#labels Phase-Implementation

= What we are looking for? =
 * Source code and fixes contributions
 * Documentation assistance
 * Product and feature suggestions

= Where do I start? =
 * Download latest release, run it.
 * Read documents in Wiki.
 * Check out source code from SVN, build it.
 * Discuss Gaixie Micrite with other people in mailing lists.
 * Post bugs and other issues in Issues page.
 * Fix bug and send patch to us.
